Lib¶

This script backs up a local file system with everything from the DocumentCloud repo.

docstring

Matches the Lens database with DocumentCloud.

contracts.lib.lens_doc_cloud_sync.get_from_metadata(doc, field)¶

contracts.lib.lens_doc_cloud_sync.match_contract(doc)¶

Match a particular contract.

contracts.lib.lens_doc_cloud_sync.match_lens_db_to_document_cloud()¶

Match the Lens database to DocumentCloud.

DocumentCloud can take anywhere from one minute to 30 minutes to cache new uploads and reflect their changes in its API.

This checks DocumentCloud to make sure that the latest changes have been synched.

This script runs the daily downloader.

These models gather and organize published contracts from the city.

get_half_filled_contracts()¶

A half-filled contract is where we know DC ID but don’t know PO number or any of the other metadata in the city’s PO system because when we upload the contract to DC...

DocumentCloud doesn’t give immediate access to all document properties. This pulls out the contracts in the database added during upload but that still need to have their details filled in.

Returns:SQLAlchemy query result.
get_lens_vendor_id(vendor)¶

Returns:string. The ID for the vendor.

class contracts.lib.models.LensRepository¶

A purchase order has a PO number. A PO number is an authorization to purchase. It gets associated with a city contract once the authorization goes through.

A PO number is used to track a contract in the city’s purchasing system.

check_if_public_and_need_to_download(purchase_order_no)¶

Returns:???
download_purchaseorder(purchase_order_no)¶

Download (the contract matching this purchase order number?).

Parameters:purchase_order_no (string.) – The contract’s unique ID for DocumentCloud.
Returns:???
static get_skip_list()¶

Some contracts are not posted on the city’s site even though they are included in the city’s contract inventory. We put these contracts on a skip list so they are ignored in code.

Returns:list. Includes the contract codes to skip.

  • file_location (string.) – The contract’s unique ID for DocumentCloud.

class contracts.lib.models.PurchaseOrder(purchase_order_no, download_attachments=True)¶

A purchase order has a PO number. A PO number is an authorization to purchase. It gets associated with a city contract once the authorization goes through.

A PO number is used to track a contract in the city’s purchasing system.

static check_invalid(html)¶

Sometimes invalid purchase orders are posted. Check if this is one of those.

Parameters:html (string) – The (contract page’s) HTML.
Returns:boolean. True if an invalid contract page, False if valid.

Creates the results language on the /search page, such as, “10 sales found for keyword ‘LLC.’”
